title: Noob at teamwork?
body:
So I believe I'm a decent player at lol. My go to role is jungle I love ganking and killing adcs. But some games end really bad and I can't tell if I could've done something different. One of my most recent games every lane was pinging for help and feeding. 
 
 So I had a few questions before I entered rank soon. What should I do in this situation? Is there mismatch champions even though both can play that lane? What to do about a teammate who's 0/10. Is Thunderlord good on melee since it scales higher with ad? 

 Also I watch challenger streamers already. Any guides or players in particular?

replies.body: Thanks for the responses will just wait till ranked
You are lv27, You cant expect anyone to know what they are doing for a while yet, just carry on.
Play tanks :) Cause its what low elo tends to lack, and its def the game changer role <3 gl fam
